PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Sceptre crafting steps:
1. Make a clean rare +1 all sceptre (or wand) Either alt spam, regal and anull (can use cannot roll caster annulls if possible) or use corroded-metallic-shuddering-jagged fossil combo and annull it down to 1-mod. 2. Use "can have up to 3 crafted mods", "prefixes cannot be changed" and "cannot roll attack modifiers" 3. Use "add Physical modifier, remove random modifier" on the harvest bench. Sceptre should now be +1 all, +1 phys 4. Craft "Prefixes cannot be changed" if it is not still on there from step 2. 5. Use Aisling 4 slam from Catarina. 6a. If you got a veiled prefix, unveil Spell Damage if possible. If it did not show up, unveil a non-caster tagged mod, craft "cannot roll caster mods" and anull until the veiled mod has been removed. Re-craft the "cannot roll caster" if you annull it. Back to Step 4 6b. If you got a veiled suffix, block "Chaos Damage over Time Multiplier", then aim to unveil cast speed, Double Damage or Crit Multiplier. If you miss the unveil, use "Prefixes cannot be changed", Scouring and back to step 4. 7. Craft "Can have up to 3 modifiers" and craft 2 of these: Spell Damage, Cast Speed and Crit multiplier (depending on what's missing after step 6.)
